title: StructureFinance
author: StructureFinance
content: Hello Frens,We would like to introduce ourselves and our new project - Structure Finance!We are asking for feedback about the platform from both newbies and experienced traders. Please take a minute to check it out:  https://structure.financeThis user-friendly platform caters to both beginners and experienced traders, offering powerful tools and real-time data for well-informed decision-making. Structure Finance ensures security and transparency for worry-free trading, and offers a wide variety of financial products for users.Here’s how it works: Structure Finance is a decentralized blockchain-based platform for structured financial products. Our products offer users a variety of payoffs that are not accessible via conventional financial instruments. They allow us to express market views and manage risk in new and innovative ways.Please let us know what you think. Your feedback is valuable to us – it will help us fine-tune our platform to better serve our users.

comments.author: SharonC
comments.body: Hello! Could you tell more about the products? What are they for?

comments.author: svgisawmn
comments.body: wow. DNT seems like a very easy and nice product. Can you tell me more?So, basically I can double my money if I predict the correct BTC price range for the next 5 min?

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: StructureFinance on August 02, 2023, 09:23:03 AMHello Frens,We would like to introduce ourselves and our new project - Structure Finance!We are asking for feedback about the platform from both newbies and experienced traders. Please take a minute to check it out:  https://structure.financeIf you go to the service board you will see some projects running a paid review. And you will see how deep some knowledgeable members of this forum go to review the project. You do no expect people who has better thing to do with their time to review every random project that isn't even proven to be genuine or scamQuote from: StructureFinance on August 02, 2023, 09:23:03 AMHere’s how it works: Structure Finance is a decentralized blockchain-based platform for structured financial products. Our products offer users a variety of payoffs that are not accessible via conventional financial instruments. They allow us to express market views and manage risk in new and innovative ways.Please let us know what you think. Your feedback is valuable to us – it will help us fine-tune our platform to better serve our users. This explanation only is not enough to enable the community understand the problems your project is solving. You can make a better thread and show pictorial flow chart of your project. You can do this by buying a copper membership to enable you post images.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Domain and project details for about two years. However, there is no active product for you, not on social media pages, not even articles or analyzes. What was the project doing during the past two years?I see that you offer interest rate products along with derivatives, however, the service is decentralized and interacts with the oracle network with centralized products, so how can this be done without identity verification?

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: I don't like it when an unpopular platform posts banners of their so-called backers, supporters, or partners without a clickable link or an article to back up their claim of partnership or having them as backers, you have to show proof on anything that you are going to post on your homepage and since you are going to have a pre-sale, you should create a thread in the altcoin announcement thread, its also better if you can have the team profile included in your homepage since you are going to launch crowdfunding.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Your project is actually quite interesting but after I checked the website I found some odd things, such as the banner from the backer that was made up, the whitepaper was very short, there was no audit, the team profile was not clear, and there was no development activity in 2 in recent years.if you guys are serious about developing this platform, it should be in the past 2 years you have progressed a lot but it looks like there is no development at all and even I can say that this is a scam/dead project from what I can see.

comments.author: DYING_S0UL
comments.body: What were you doing in this past 2 years exactly? I don't see any real time progress. Also there were no real time products nor any marketing. I checked your social, there weren't much activity either. It's likely a dead project. You don't have much supporter or members on telegram either. Your twitter account is also likely dead.I'm totally confused with what you are trying to build!?

comments.author: StructureFinance
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on August 07, 2023, 12:29:42 PMDomain and project details for about two years. However, there is no active product for you, not on social media pages, not even articles or analyzes. What was the project doing during the past two years?I see that you offer interest rate products along with derivatives, however, the service is decentralized and interacts with the oracle network with centralized products, so how can this be done without identity verification?https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/08/07/GIqkP.pngHi, thanks for your feedback.We have been working on product development for the last two years, and the domain itself was purchased prior to development. This has been a difficult product to develop, and we wanted to ensure it was top quality. We create user-friendly products that are similar to futures, but much simpler to use without a deep understanding of the futures market.We are currently working on a flagship product that will be followed by two additional productsData collection from centralized platforms is open information and does not require verification to use it

comments.author: StructureFinance
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on August 07, 2023, 02:00:46 PMI don't like it when an unpopular platform posts banners of their so-called backers, supporters, or partners without a clickable link or an article to back up their claim of partnership or having them as backers, you have to show proof on anything that you are going to post on your homepage and since you are going to have a pre-sale, you should create a thread in the altcoin announcement thread, its also better if you can have the team profile included in your homepage since you are going to launch crowdfunding. Hello, thank you for your comment and advice. We will add more information about partners, including active links.

comments.author: StructureFinance

Our product is under development, we have been working on it for the past 2 years and it is now at the final stage. There will be 3 different products in total. We have spent a lot of time thinking carefully through everything.We create user-friendly products that are similar to futures, but much simpler to use without a deep understanding of the futures market.We are currently working on a flagship product that will be followed by two additional products
